plot: With his lawyer having a secretary under his desk, it's no wonder an old man finds his grandson's bride via an audition. Winner Ginger is sent to the cook, but other hired help follow. The maid gets some too pretending being Ginger.
title: Ginger
plot_es: With his lawyer having a secretary under his desk, it's no wonder an old man finds his grandson's bride via an audition. Winner Ginger is sent to the cook, but other hired help follow. The maid gets some too pretending being Ginger.
